AboutPage.description: I like to be constantly learning and evolving. That's the reason why I decided to change my professional career and devote myself entirely to the web development field. I feel comfortable working as a team, I consider myself an organized person and committed to my work.

educationData.name4: Master's Degree in Marketing and Design
educationData.name5: Degree in Business Administration and Management

experienceData.description1: Frontend development with ReactJS and React Native. UX/UI Design with Figma. SCRUM methodology
experienceData.description2: Instructor for the Web Development with WordPress module in the Advanced Course in Web Design and Development.
experienceData.description3: Frontend development with ReactJS and Material UI. UX/UI Design with Figma. SCRUM methodology
experienceData.description4: Partnership. Communication. Flexibility. Ability to work as a team. Pressure tolerance. Empathy
experienceData.description5: Time management. Ability to work as a team. Responsibility. Interpersonal skills. Conflict resolution. Leadership.
experienceData.description6: Fashion brand creation. Clothing design. Online store creation. Decision making. Innovation. Initiative. Resolution
experienceData.description7: Creativity. Communication skills. Attention to detail. Positive attitude.

recommendationsData.text1: From the moment Lourdes joined our company, she demonstrated exceptional talent and skills. In just a few days, she quickly adapted to our work environment, integrating herself in a way that it seemed like she had been working with us for years. Her dedication and unwavering commitment allowed her to quickly take on responsibilities and tackle challenging tasks. Lourdes has handled all the Frontend programming for our projects, showcasing a natural ability to transform designs into seamless and intuitive user experiences. Her coding expertise and meticulous attention to detail have allowed us to optimize our processes and meet deadlines, even on highly complex projects (...). Without a doubt, I highly recommend Lourdes as an exceptional UI/UX developer and Frontend specialist. I am confident that her talent, creativity, and interpersonal skills will make her an invaluable asset to any organization.
